next(A,B):- my_succ(C,B),my_true(A,C).
next(A,p):- does(A,robot,a),not_my_true(A,p),magic(robot),magic(a),magic(p).

next(A,p):- my_true(A,p),does(A,robot,c),magic(p),magic(c),magic(robot).
next(A,r):- does(A,robot,a),my_true(A,r),magic(r),magic(a),magic(robot).
next(A,r):- my_true(A,q),does(A,robot,c),magic(c),magic(robot),magic(r),magic(q).
